name: Escape From B.U.T.T.
description:
KNOWN ISSUE: The Audio in the web build has pops in it for some reason, I don't know how to fix this and don't have enough time to figure out how to fix this. If you want to experience the game as it was meant to be played please download the .exe

in this hard fast paced platformer you play as a robot to escape from the Brain Utilization Testing Territory (aka B.U.T.T.).

This game was made by me in one week for the Explosive gamejam, together with all the art, assets and scripts.

tools used:
art: gimp
game engine: unity
code editor: visual studio
music: bosca ceoil, SFXR
